reviewText: The Movie has 4 DVDs, needed maybe 2. very protracted, but still quite good
Sooo funny and touching with great actors!
Item was packaged well. Discs had some minute scratches and smudges but were generally in good condition.

I've been looking for this drama for some time. My computer crashed on me & I lost my fansubbed version. Now, I have a hard copy. Awesome!!!

DVD arrived quickly & very nicely packaged. No damage during shipping.

Ratio is 4:3. Video quality is high def but wished there was a widescreen version, however the screen ratio was given in the description and I knew that I wasn't getting widescreen. There was one episode (I forgot which one) where a couple of phrases weren't subtitled. The $47 price tag seems a bit excessive but, it's probably because it's an import.
